breast.transformationDescription: [npc.She] now [npc.has] [style.boldSnake(snake-like)], [npc.nipplesFullDescription], and when lactating, [npc.she] will produce [style.boldSnake(snake milk)].
breast.crotchBoobsTransformationDescription: [npc.She] now [npc.has] [style.boldSnake(snake-like)], [npc.crotchNipplesFullDescription], and when lactating, [npc.she] will produce [style.boldSnake(snake milk)].
